name: Doughnut Haven | Early Beta
description:
You start a doughnut business to create doughnuts. You create your first batch of doughnuts but to no avail. Even the neighborhood racoon won't eat them. Eventually you find success when your family tries yours second batch. Will your doughnut business succeed?

The game is in early development, so support is appreciated. This is one of my favourite games to date as I have been working on it for awhile. I will also add easter eggs from my cancelled game "Darksand". The game was too frustrating to make. Anyhow, enjoy the game and expect updates!

Expected Features to release in the 0.1.1 Update:
  • Easter Theme
  • Bug Fixes
  • And More Upgrades

Update Release Date will be announced on March 21st. For now expect Bug Fixes.
